tool.name: Create model to recommend tools

param.name: input_tabular_tool_usage
param.label: Dataset containing usage frequencies of tools

param.name: input_cutoff_date
param.label: The earliest date from which usage of tools will be extracted
param.help: Provide a date (in the past) in yyyy-mm-dd format

param.name: input_maximum_path_length
param.label: Maximum number of tools in a tool sequence

param.name: optimize_n_epochs
param.label: Number of training iterations to optimize the neural network parameters

param.name: max_evals
param.label: Maximum number of evaluations of different configurations of parameters

param.name: test_share
param.label: Share of the test data
param.help: Provide a real number between 0.0 and 1.0. This set of data is used to verify learning after training.

param.name: validation_share
param.label: Share of the validation data
param.help: Provide a real number between 0.0 and 1.0. This set of data is used to validate each step of learning.

param.name: batch_size
param.label: Range of the size of training batch
param.help: Provide a range (comma separated) to sample the batch size. For example - 10, 500.

param.name: units
param.label: Range of the number of hidden recurrent units
param.help: Provide a range (comma separated) to sample the batch size. For example - 10, 500.

param.name: embedding_size
param.label: Range of the size of embedding vector
param.help: Provide a range (comma separated) to sample the embedding size. For example - 10, 500.

param.name: dropout
param.label: Dropout between neural network layers
param.help: Provide a real number between 0.0 and 1.0

param.name: recurrent_dropout
param.label: Dropout for recurrent layers
param.help: Provide a real number between 0.0 and 1.0

param.name: learning_rate
param.label: Range of the learning rate
param.help: Provide a range of positive real numbers

param.name: activation_recurrent
param.label: Name of the activation function for recurrent layers

param.name: activation_output
param.label: Name of the activation function for output layer

tool.help: **What it does** It creates a trained model which is used to recommend tools
